title: BRIEF-Cynata Advances Toward Phase 2 Clinical Trial Of Cymerus(Tm) MSCs In Patients With Osteoarthritis

BRIEF-Cynata Advances Toward Phase 2 Clinical Trial Of Cymerus(Tm) MSCs In Patients With Osteoarthritis Oct 4 (Reuters) - Cynata Therapeutics Ltd : * CYNATA ADVANCES TOWARD PHASE 2 CLINICAL TRIAL OF CYMERUS(TM) MSCS IN PATIENTS WITH OSTEOARTHRITIS * CYNATA THERAPEUTICS LTD - PHASE 2 CLINICAL TRIAL IN OSTEOARTHRITIS EXPECTED TO COMMENCE IN QUARTER 1 2020
